entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with wet snow except periods of snow inland. Snowfall amount 4 cm inland. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with wet snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Periods of snow inland in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
